name: events
description: This analytics table contains all events tracked in the Meditation iOS app.

columns.name: category
columns.description: Category parameter of an event, for example onboarding.

columns.name: action
columns.description: Action parameter of an event, for example screenview.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name parameter of an event, for example bindle-content.

columns.name: screen_resolution
columns.description: Resolution of a user’s smartphone, for example 375x812.

columns.name: device_type
columns.description: Model of a user’s smartphone and the version of the OS, for example iPhone 15 Pro,17.0

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: ID of a user in the users table.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country derived from user’s IP address.

columns.name: custom_parameters
columns.description: All custom parameters of an even in a key-value format.
